original_title: Home ความรัก ความสุข ความทรงจำ
overview: Ne is taking photographs of his school campus at night when he meets a younger student acquaintance, Beam. The two talk about their experiences, relationships and plans for the future, but have to part as morning comes. Buajan, who continues to find notes left by her late husband, which keep her bonded to his memory but also prevents her from moving on. Preeya and Leng, a businessman from Phuket. Problems arise on the wedding day after Preeya has an encounter with her ex-boyfriend Pek, although she is supported by her aunt and brother.
tagline: Don't just know love, but feel love more.
title: Home: Love, Happiness, Memories
